content: SCOB DG Drywall router bit with guide point Premium cut-out bit with guide point for cutting drywall and gypsum board ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - ### FEATURES:Features Router bit tip includes guide point SCOB DG 1/8 – guide point makes tracing around boxes easier SCOB DG 5/32 – shank diameter 5/32 for maximum versatility and longer lifetime Applications SCOB DG 1/8 – for cuts around outlet boxes, can lights, etc. SCOB DG 5/32 – for outlet cut-outs, doors and windows SCOB DDW 1/4 – for long openings for doors and windows For all drywall boards up to 1 thick ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Drywall, Gypsum Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Base material | Drywall, Gypsum | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2149749 - Cut-out bit SCOB DG 1/8 (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 3552455 - Master Carton Cut-out bit SCOB DG 1/8 (70x10) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 700x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 1/8 (10) - 2149890 - Cut-out bit SCOB DG 5/32 (10) - Package Size 10 pc - 3552456 - Master Carton Cut-out bit SCOB DG 5/32 (70x10) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 700x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 5/32 (10) - 2149891 - Cut-out bit SCOB DDW 1/4 (5) - Package Size 5 pc - 3552457 - Master Carton Cut-out bit SCOB DDW 1/4 (20x5) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x Cut-out bit SCOB DDW 1/4 (5)
